On Apr 1, 2005, at 3:30 AM, p p wrote:

> Both will do fine as long as its a first had account of a battle or a 
> document of some sort.

I would start with having a good look at the "battle screens."
Maybe somebody can point out to some website where some are reproduced?
There are also many books in Japanese that describe the painting and 
the battles in detail.
